subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In a letter, Bob Natiello pleaded guilty to his life of crime as a turnstile boy at Ebbets Field in 1944, when a seventh-place Dodgers team played there.
snippet: In a letter, Bob Natiello pleaded guilty to his life of crime as a turnstile boy at Ebbets Field in 1944, when a seventh-place Dodgers team played there.
